name: All links become blue
description: This should force all links to become blue #0000EE and underscored, regardless of having visited or not (or hovering, or while clicking).  If the pic on this page is covered by ads so that you can't see the sample screenshot, here's a blurry copy (hosted on Pinterest, so it's lost some of the finer detail) — sorry for the link, but it seems that the image itself won't show up here: screenshot of Wikipedia with style installed. Sometimes there's no underscore (as with Google results' links, unless hovered over [DuckDuckGo is OK, oddly]) — hence my release note section below. For a tutorial on writing CSS work skin rules (with a focus on fonts, colors, highlighting, circling, etc. on AO3, and can be used for general CSS purposes), please see Fonts, and colors, and work skins, oh my!.
